
                            
                            <p>刚刚发帖，想问一下大众，大家都问我要福特的明细！ <br> 分享一下给新人 <br>  <br> 本地福特直接给核销了，没要求试驾 <br> 需要两样 <br> 第一:驾照 <br> 第二:中奖的VX <br> 先抽奖，抽到好东西再确认！然后加客服VX！再去店里试驾核销 <br> 然后第二天有试驾报告，发给客服即可 <br> 15天内发货到家 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/131651bmmd99t07wbtyy6s.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/131651bmmd99t07wbtyy6s.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/131657ql78lz9lm9d4d7u7.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/131657ql78lz9lm9d4d7u7.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/131704lwr7nly5tuywb53n.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/131704lwr7nly5tuywb53n.jpg"> <br>  <br> 上面是入口，我已经领过奖品就不能再抽了！ <br> 邀请好友助力增加一次抽奖机会！ <br> 还有几个第一批的商品图嗮一下 <br>  <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/131916uq3hjzpiqcpmzcqh.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/131916uq3hjzpiqcpmzcqh.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/131958asju8sfrfsl8zewc.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/131958asju8sfrfsl8zewc.jpg"> <br>  <br>  </p>
